column1: Smoque BBQ////Anytime you see a line out the door for food - eat there. People don't want to wait for ANYTHING
column2: but most humans are intelligent enough to understand the concept of a worthy sacrifice. Fortunately the line wasn't out the door like I have seen
column3: but there was enough of a line for people behind and in front of us to complain incessantly. The staff is prepared for the long lines
column4: so if you can't deal with waiting and sitting next to strangers
column5: do us all a favor and eat somewhere else.
